pageContext.claim: “We are not going to allow the radical left to control our borders. Because if they do, you will see crime; you will see drugs; you will see human trafficking like you have never seen ever in the history of our country.”
pageContext.analysis: Trump insinuates that illegal immigration breeds crime, but most independent research contradicts the idea that illegal immigrants bring more crime. Most drugs flow through legal crossing points along the border, so a wall would not have much of an impact. Human trafficking also goes mostly through legal crossing points.
